name: Gravity Django
description:
Physic base puzzle with procedural generator. 

  • Team Name - Kiborgik
  • Each Team Member's Name and Email Address - YAKOVYSHYN, PETRO black_don@ukr.net
  • Game Name - Gravity Django

GAME RULES:

- Throw green ball to green window

- Activate any object with gravity gun (RMB)

- Throw (LMB)

- Movement (WASD)

- You can be any physics object in game

- You can add impulse to Activated objects with keyboard arrow

- Hiden rules

Create for 

2018 Summer #ue4jam
